attributes.action: stop charging people with the chronic/life limiting/life threatening blood disorder ITP for prescription drugs/treatment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ideopathic Thrombocytopenic Purpura (ITP)is a blood disorder with no known cause and no known cure.
In childhood ITP there is a 80% remmission rate. However,adult ITP tends to be Chronic, life limiting and life threatening. Without treatment an ITP patient can die from spontaneous internal major organ bleeds,brain haemorrhage etc. Despite this, patients are charged for their treatment, this treatment being experimental and the treatment itself carrying health risks to the patient eg the development of skin cancers and lymphoma.
